channel.title: Black Friday Gauntlet League Wrestling
channel.description:
![GLW%20Banner|690x230](upload://jFSSrI0ONnTRd0YIIGTK5HCUAs2.jpeg) **WRESTLE ALL THE THINGS! CONQUER ALL THE ARENAS! SEIZE THE GAUNTLET!**
Gauntlet League Wrestling! After a season of changes, management goes on the road to test out new talent.
This *World Wide Wrestling* session will have quick character set up followed by everyone fighting for the prize-- a contract with the promotion. A curated set of playbooks will be available. Feel free to recreate past characters. No experience necessary with pro wrestling or the rules, everything will be taught in a friendly environment.
If you’ve been curious about World Wide Wrestling, come in and try it out. It’s fun and furious for any and all. Your Creative’s a relative newb to Pro-Wrestling so we’ll all advance together.
Move lists and playbooks will be posted ahead of time. Content Warning: Some wrestling gimmicks and storylines can hit on problematic areas. We will discuss tone and use the X-Card for safety.
The session will last 3-4 hours. We will be using Zoom for the meeting and recording the session. IF YOU SIGN UP, PLEASE ADD THIS TO YOUR CALENDAR. LET’S GET IT ON!!!
[date=2019-11-29 time=14:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-11-29 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LsnFs6c7OYIhGun4MQr)

item.title: Black Friday Gauntlet League Wrestling
